text: The Amazon 241 stock split went through today taking the stock from over a thousand dollars to now a hundred twenty four bucks after hours Awesome opportunity now if you're an investor timing probably doesn't matter too much if you like the stock share get him whenever you feel like it for traders though specifically me Now's not the time Although I am excited about the split makes it more accessible which is great. There's definitely heavy volume flowing into the stock really high volume today compared to the 70 day volume average despite all of that One year on a six month chart. It's in a downtrend so before I start going long products like this I like to wait for strength. It's exactly what I'm doing here. So for me it is a temporary pass Put it on the watch list see if there's a good reversal but until then not buy in even though it's interesting Got a stick to the plan catch you guys later

metadata.title: Time to Buy Amazon? #shorts

#Trading #Stocks #BeAnOutlier

My name is Erik. I'm a Marine Veteran, information activist, and trader for 15+ years. 
I don't come from money and am nothing special - yet I still made my first million before I was 30. The stock market played a critical role in my ability to develop wealth. 

What is esInvests? 
A community dedicated to becoming financial Outliers without the BS. Here, I share my first hand experience developing wealth via trading, real estate, and angel investing. 

What can you expect?
Investing basics, options trading, portfolio management, trading psychology, trading strategy, money management, live trading, live market reviews, trader workshops, real estate and angel investing, all coupled with some fun along the way. 

Welcome to the Outliers!

I am not a financial advisor. All content is shared for educational and entertainment purposes only.
